info.name: Global - Pseudo Brightness Control
info.description: Recommended - Pseudo element version: Simply change the opacity in the code to adjust the "brightness". IFRAMEs will be doubly affected. Uses pointer-events property. Confirmed working in Chrome and Firefox.
